name: SaveTheOwl
description:
Vad ska det här vara bra för presents...

Save The Owl

Credits

The idea came from my good friend Tommy

He love owls. And remember this is only a game. Not reality

Everything by me, exept finding that owl on the internet. Love at first sight.

Controls

Left Mouse Button / tap with finger

Minor updates

2018-08-24 the best score is saved on a file

Bugs

Works on PC. There are problems on other platforms.

Fixes are on their way. Blame Postnord. I do.

Other stuff

No Owls was injured during the production of this game

I finished it, Marlene :) Love you.
